# Employee Publish
Checks the Service Bus for topics last accessed timestamp, gets all changes from the Change Data Feed and sends each record to the service bus topic. 
See https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/samples/azure/azure-sdk-for-python/servicebus-samples/ for servicebus samples
## Get Servicebus connectionstring from Key Vault

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
akv_name=spark.sparkContext.environment.get('keyVaultName', 'get')
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
conn_str = mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret(akv_name, secret_name, kv_linked_service)

from azure.servicebus.management import ServiceBusAdministrationClient
with ServiceBusAdministrationClient.from_connection_string(conn_str) as servicebus_mgmt_client:
    topic_accessed_at=get_topic_accessed_at(servicebus_mgmt_client)
print(topic_accessed_at)

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
history_df = spark.sql("DESCRIBE HISTORY odw_curated_db.employee")
hist_df_pandas = history_df.toPandas()
## Get the latest changes from CDF and send messages

from azure.servicebus import ServiceBusClient, ServiceBusMessage
servicebus_client = ServiceBusClient.from_connection_string(conn_str=conn_str, logging_enable=True)

try:
    # cdf_df=(spark.read.format("delta")
    #     .option("readChangeFeed", "true")
    #     .option("startingTimestamp", starting_timestamp)
    #     .table(table_name))
    # cdf_df=cdf_df.filter("_change_type != 'update_preimage'") #CDF provides preimage and postimage records
    with servicebus_client:
        sender = servicebus_client.get_topic_sender(topic_name=topic_name)
        with sender:
            # df_json = cdf_df.toJSON()
            # row_count=df_json.count()
            # for row in df_json.collect(): 
            # send_single_message(sender,row,custom_props_attributes)
            message = ServiceBusMessage("Single Message for me")
            sender.send_messages(message)
            # print("Sent {} messages.".format(row_count))

except Exception as e:  
        print(f"{e}")
